name: WaveEscape
description:
This is a 3D run game in which you run away from the red wave that is chasing you from behind while avoiding hitting walls and obstacles.

There are curves in the middle of the road, which speed up the process if you can make a good turn. The trick to a good curve is to use the brakes to slow down if you are going too fast, and to keep your body in the direction of the turn. Since it is not a car, you cannot drift, but you can experience driving on the edge of the line using the brakes!

Thank you for your time.
